item.title: revivehost美国测评
item.description:
<pre class="line-numbers language-none"><code class="language-none">root@ss:~# curl -sL yabs.sh | bash -s -- # ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## # # Yet-Another-Bench-Script # # v2023-09-06 # # https:&#x2F;&#x2F;github.com&#x2F;masonr&#x2F;yet-another-bench-script # # ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## ## #
Mon 13 Nov 2023 09:48:39 PM EST
Basic System Information: --------------------------------- Uptime : 43 days, 15 hours, 36 minutes Processor : Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E5-2623 v4 @ 2.60GHz CPU cores : 1 @ 2596.990 MHz AES-NI : ✔ Enabled VM-x&#x2F;AMD-V : ✔ Enabled RAM : 976.4 MiB Swap : 1024.0 MiB Disk : 8.8 GiB Distro : Debian GNU&#x2F;Linux 11 (bullseye) Kernel : 5.10.0-8-amd64 VM Type : KVM IPv4&#x2F;IPv6 : ✔ Online &#x2F; ❌ Offline
IPv4 Network Information: --------------------------------- ISP : ReviveHost ASN : AS31916 ReviveHost Host : ReviveHost Location : Miami, Florida (FL) Country : United States
fio Disk Speed Tests (Mixed R&#x2F;W 50&#x2F;50): --------------------------------- Block Size | 4k (IOPS) | 64k (IOPS) ------ | --- ---- | ---- ---- Read | 1.61 MB&#x2F;s (404) | 24.11 MB&#x2F;s (376) Write | 1.65 MB&#x2F;s (412) | 24.57 MB&#x2F;s (383) Total | 3.26 MB&#x2F;s (816) | 48.69 MB&#x2F;s (759) | | Block Size | 512k (IOPS) | 1m (IOPS) ------ | --- ---- | ---- ---- Read | 53.14 MB&#x2F;s (103) | 78.41 MB&#x2F;s (76) Write | 56.19 MB&#x2F;s (109) | 83.63 MB&#x2F;s (81) Total | 109.34 MB&#x2F;s (212) | 162.05 MB&#x2F;s (157)

Geekbench 6 Benchmark Test: --------------------------------- Test | Value | Single Core | 209 Multi Core | 117 Full Test | https:&#x2F;&#x2F;browser.geekbench.com&#x2F;v6&#x2F;cpu&#x2F;3539000
